chat_history.message: Hello, My iPhone 13 Pro has the above issue: Hi, the package has been delayed for a week in Hamburg, with the delivery date being pushed back one day each day. Is it possible to inquire here where the package is? Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The customer has already reported the parcel as lost to UPS.

How do you want to proceed now?

Regards,
Olga from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner regarding this and will update you accordingly. 

Regards,
TB

Dear ecomobile

Do you have any news?

Regards,
Olga from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We extend our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience caused. It has come to our attention that the parcel may have been stolen. We take such incidents very seriously and have launched an extensive internal inquiry to ascertain the circumstances surrounding this unfortunate event. As a gesture of our commitment to customer satisfaction and to alleviate any inconvenience caused, we have promptly refunded the customer in full for their order.

Regards,
JY
